The claim was made in a Facebook post on: 2020, which has been shared more than 1,000 times.
The misleading Facebook post included a: language caption stating that Israel sent a vaccine to Wuhan, China, which has cured 479 patients.
The post included four photos: showing a man next to a microscope, a man in scrubs, two people in white gowns, and the interiors of a medical facility.
The World Health Organization: WHO) has stated that there is "no specific medicine" to prevent or treat the novel coronavirus, but is working with various groups worldwide to develop a treatment.
